name: Lets Get Silly (Dungeon Edition)
description:
Lets Get Silly (Dungeon Edition) takes the player on a short, satirical, but wild ride! The player begins as a trespasser on an unknown property, when suddenly he is called upon to complete a dangerous task: rescue the families youngest child from an evil monster that they have been holding captive in their secret dungeon... Little Joe's life is all in your hands, are you up for the heroic journey? A wise man once said, "The sillier, the better!" 

Couldn't have made this project happen without a few extraordinary tile sets: 

https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-dungeon-tileset-8x8  - Dungeon (Dungeon Background, monster/ guard/ chest/ coin sprites) 

https://pixelmech.itch.io/gb-studio-tiles - Woodland (spikes in monsters lair)

https://chasersgaming.itch.io/rpg-asset-tile-set-mansion-gameboy Mansion (House)

Trees and grass in opening scene, Rocks in monster layer, as well as Billy and Joe's sprites are taken from GB Studio's sample project template. 

All other sprites are all original created in Piskel.

Time to get silly! 

~E.O.
